positions.title: Analyst (Business Intelligence)
positions.description_html:
As an Analyst, I spearheaded zone-level reporting initiatives, translating business needs into data-driven solutions and communicating insights. I effectively organized and managed Power BI projects to meet objectives and timelines.

‚Ä¢ Optimized existing reports through improved dashboard design and automated Excel reporting.
‚Ä¢ Implemented Snowflake data solution across hubs and leveraged Power BI dataflows for optimized data reuse.
‚Ä¢ Ensured data quality by creating and monitoring health check reports.
‚Ä¢ Drove data governance by managing user access through apps and workspaces.
‚Ä¢ Performed ETL from various data sources like SAP, SAP Analytics Cloud, Snowflake, and SQL data warehouses.
‚Ä¢ Developed expertise in Power BI, Advanced DAX, Excel, Snowflake, SQL, Power Automate through data modeling, transformation, and visualization initiatives.

positions.subtitle: Nestl√©
positions.description: As a Jr. Analyst in Business Intelligence, I coordinated across European hubs to develop tailored reports that met market and stakeholder needs. Working closely with operations and finance, I managed existing reporting while creating 15+ new reports aligned to KPI and BI strategy implementation.‚Ä¢	Partnered with central data teams and local markets to gather input and provide automated Power BI solutions, reducing manual Excel processes.‚Ä¢	Drove adoption of Power BI through developing reports and dashboards that enabled self-service insights for business users.‚Ä¢	Created reports with Advanced DAX to pull and transform data from sources like SAP, SAP Cloud for Analysis, and SQL databases.‚Ä¢	Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, Power BI, Advanced DAX, SAP/SAP Analytics Cloud, and SQL through report design and automation initiatives.
positions.title: Junior Analyst (Business Intelligence)
positions.description_html:
As a Jr. Analyst in Business Intelligence, I coordinated across European hubs to develop tailored reports that met market and stakeholder needs. Working closely with operations and finance, I managed existing reporting while creating 15+ new reports aligned to KPI and BI strategy implementation.

‚Ä¢ Partnered with central data teams and local markets to gather input and provide automated Power BI solutions, reducing manual Excel processes.
‚Ä¢ Drove adoption of Power BI through developing reports and dashboards that enabled self-service insights for business users.
‚Ä¢ Created reports with Advanced DAX to pull and transform data from sources like SAP, SAP Cloud for Analysis, and SQL databases.
‚Ä¢ Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, Power BI, Advanced DAX, SAP/SAP Analytics Cloud, and SQL through report design and automation initiatives.

positions.subtitle: Nestl√©
positions.description: As a Finance Intern, I spearheaded initiatives to streamline freight settlement processes across Nestl√©'s European hubs. Scheduling and leading meetings with UK, Italy, France, and Poland teams enabled me to document workflows and identify irregularities hindering operations. I drafted standardized, best practice processes for freight settlement, reducing inconsistencies across geographies.Additionally, I leveraged Advanced Excel skills to analyze SAP TM data for financial reconciliations, pinpointing and resolving discrepancies.Key Contributions:‚Ä¢	Standardized freight settlement workflows across 4 European hubs to drive process consistency‚Ä¢	Identified and recommended solutions for irregularities that disrupted hub operations‚Ä¢	Conducted financial reconciliations, ensuring data integrity‚Ä¢	Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, SAP, and Microsoft 365 through process enhancement and data analysis initiatives
positions.title: Finance Intern
positions.description_html:
As a Finance Intern, I spearheaded initiatives to streamline freight settlement processes across Nestl√©'s European hubs. Scheduling and leading meetings with UK, Italy, France, and Poland teams enabled me to document workflows and identify irregularities hindering operations. I drafted standardized, best practice processes for freight settlement, reducing inconsistencies across geographies.

Additionally, I leveraged Advanced Excel skills to analyze SAP TM data for financial reconciliations, pinpointing and resolving discrepancies.

Key Contributions:
‚Ä¢ Standardized freight settlement workflows across 4 European hubs to drive process consistency
‚Ä¢ Identified and recommended solutions for irregularities that disrupted hub operations
‚Ä¢ Conducted financial reconciliations, ensuring data integrity
‚Ä¢ Developed expertise in Advanced Excel, SAP, and Microsoft 365 through process enhancement and data analysis initiatives
